long_description: The 3-season NEMO Veda 2P Tent gives 2 backpackers a magical combination of light weight, packability and livability you both will love while living on the trail. Ultralight design relies on 2 pairs of trekking poles (sold separately) instead of tent poles to minimize weight and create a spacious interior with ample sitting height. Oversized grommets locate the tips of crossed trekking poles; reinforced areas at the top of the tent receive pole handles. Two huge vestibules offer generous protected space for both occupants' gear; they roll back with a shed-style overhang for weather protection and refreshing airflow. Wicking fabric overhead effectively manages condensation; built-in light pockets make it easy to illuminate the interior with headlamps or other lights (sold separately). The NEMO Veda 2P Tent comes with a drybag-style stuff sack, stakes, guy-out cord and repair kit.
short_description: The 3-season NEMO Veda 2P Tent gives 2 backpackers a magical combination of light weight, packability and livability you both will love while living on the trail.
